definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, typically derived from the given name Nicholas, meaning 'victory of the people'. It is used to identify individuals or families bearing this name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自英语的姓氏，通常由教名 Nicholas 演变而来，意为‘人民的胜利’，用于指代姓尼科尔斯的个人或家族。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Nicholls presented her research on climate change at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 尼科尔斯博士在国际会议上展示了她关于气候变化的研究。
